name: Dell OptiPlex 24 7000 Series All-in-One Articulating Stand | Dell USA
description: The Dell™ OptiPlex 24 7000 Series All-in-One Articulating Stand maximizes productivity and comfort in the workplace for users of OptiPlex 7440 and 7450 All-in-One systems. With the ability to both tilt your monitor forwards and backwards and lower it to a 60 degree angle, you can ensure a comfortable and productive workspace.
